forum.name: progress of a hobbo
forum.description: some way of letting you guys know i'm not just doing nothing.
forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

thread.title: progress of 'ye old mountin path'

comments.text: i'd say i'm about 1|4 done with the base level. the first cave is almost finished. start and end goal markers are set.
base is finsidhed. trees added. teleport to and from 'archopals home' (both face you backwars for no reason).
smaller plants added. minor unatural contruction added. progress paused until linking areas are created/updated.

thread.latestCommentText: smaller plants added. minor unatural contruction added. progress paused until linking areas are created/updated.
